verses.roman:
eka-vipra paḍe prabhura caraṇa dhariyā
prabhu-saṅge nṛtya kare premāviṣṭa hañā

synonyms: eka-vipra—one brāhmaṇa; paḍe—falls down; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇa dhariyā—catching the lotus feet; prabhu-saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nṛtya kare—he dances; prema-āviṣṭa hañā—being absorbed in ecstatic love.
translation: One brāhmaṇa fell at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and then began to dance with Him in ecstatic love.
